Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, excellent service”

Reviews.Content: staff barberini hotel fantastic cant service numerous special requests rescue traveled trip 4 friends mom accidentally dropped bracelet drain night leaving course pressed airport reported situation expected bracelet staff retrieved bracelet mailed type service sets hotel apart hope return someday location breakfast fantastic
